titles.title: A resolution designating September 2012 as the "National Month of Voter Registration".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/20/2012--Introduced. Designates September 2012 as the National Month of Voter Registration. Calls on state and local election officials to conduct public outreach and take affirmative steps to encourage voter registration. Encourages states to be fully compliant with the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 and other federal voting rights laws as election day approaches.
